texts.sign_drycross:
DRYCROSS
Trade. Repairs. Shelter.
Iron Parish jurisdiction.
texts.glyph_still_order:
A worn glyph. A circle cut by three lines.
The mark feels... familiar. Like a half-remembered dream.

dlg_dax_root.speaker: Captain Dax Rowan
dlg_dax_root.text: You’re late, Cap. Storm’s building and my people are jumpy.

dlg_dax_short.speaker: Captain Dax Rowan
dlg_dax_short.text: Town’s stocked thin. Something’s out there. And someone’s hiding in plain sight.

dlg_dax_pay.speaker: Captain Dax Rowan
dlg_dax_pay.text: Iron Parish covers your tab. Don’t make me regret it.

dlg_dax_quests.speaker: Captain Dax Rowan
dlg_dax_quests.text: Always something. What can you handle?

dlg_dax_critters.speaker: Captain Dax Rowan
dlg_dax_critters.text: The damn things are multiplying. Thin their numbers before they get braver. Kill five or so around the perimeter.

dlg_dax_storm.speaker: Captain Dax Rowan
dlg_dax_storm.text: Storm's building and we're running low. Need scrap and cloth for repairs. Scavenge what you can from dead critters or the wastes.

dlg_dax_runner_hint.speaker: Captain Dax Rowan
dlg_dax_runner_hint.text: Kid went north before the clouds rolled in. Find him. Alive is preferred.

dlg_dax_scav_threat.speaker: Captain Dax Rowan
dlg_dax_scav_threat.text: The Scavs are getting organized. Camps to the southwest and southeast. Hit them before they hit us. Take out their alphas if you can—cut the head off the snake.

dlg_dax_karth_scouts.speaker: Captain Dax Rowan
dlg_dax_karth_scouts.text: Directorate scouts. Far from home and too curious about our little town. Find out what they're after. Start with their camp northeast of here.

dlg_sela_root.speaker: Sela Marr
dlg_sela_root.text: You look like you’ve been paid to not ask questions.

choices.text: I ask plenty. I just charge for answers.

dlg_sela_charge.speaker: Sela Marr
dlg_sela_charge.text: Then charge someone else. Some debts don’t survive the truth.

dlg_sela_nervous.speaker: Sela Marr
dlg_sela_nervous.text: Storms make people honest. That’s what scares me.

dlg_verdleg_work.speaker: Verdleg Trader
dlg_verdleg_work.text: Deliver a token to the ritual flats. Don’t point a gun first.

dlg_verdleg_trogs.speaker: Verdleg Trader
dlg_verdleg_trogs.text: Nomads. Rituals. Traders. Their war-bands are another story.

dlg_verdleg_elder.speaker: Verdleg Elder
dlg_verdleg_elder.text: Drycross is a knot in the wind. Every knot tightens eventually.

dlg_verdleg_elder_say.speaker: Verdleg Elder
dlg_verdleg_elder_say.text: That the storm is the least of your trouble.

dlg_verdleg_elder_ship.speaker: Verdleg Elder
dlg_verdleg_elder_ship.text: Metal birds circle when the desert smells blood.

dlg_trog_envoy.speaker: Trog Envoy
dlg_trog_envoy.text: Trade. Speak. Walk slow. No war today.

choices.text: I’m here to deliver a token.

dlg_trog_glyph.speaker: Trog Envoy
dlg_trog_glyph.text: Old. Still. Order. Not for you.

dlg_silas_root.speaker: Field Director Silas Morn
dlg_silas_root.text: By authority of the Karth Directorate, this settlement is under review.

dlg_silas_for.speaker: Field Director Silas Morn
dlg_silas_for.text: An asset that belongs to the Directorate. You’ll know her by the fear.

choices.text: That narrows it down to everyone.

dlg_vela_root.speaker: Field Medic Vela
dlg_vela_root.text: Easy there, soldier. I patch up what the desert tears apart. Need something?

dlg_vela_checkin.speaker: Field Medic Vela
dlg_vela_checkin.text: You look like you've been holding together. Good. Try to stay that way—supplies aren't infinite.

dlg_vela_role.speaker: Field Medic Vela
dlg_vela_role.text: Field medicine. When someone goes down out there, they end up here—if they're lucky. I've pulled a few back from the brink. The human body's stubborn.

dlg_vela_death.speaker: Field Medic Vela
dlg_vela_death.text: ... Cap? Can you hear me? You're fading in and out. We've got you stabilized but you're not all here. Your body's in shock—your mind's somewhere between the light and the dark.

choices.text: [Run to the light] Let go... wake up here.
[Run from the light] Fight it. I need to get back to where I fell.

dlg_vela_light.speaker: Field Medic Vela
dlg_vela_light.text: Rest easy. Your body will heal. You'll wake up groggy, but whole. Just... try not to make this a habit.

dlg_vela_dark.speaker: Field Medic Vela
dlg_vela_dark.text: Stubborn one. Fine—I'll keep your body stable. Your spirit can wander, but don't take too long. Find where you fell and pull yourself back together. You'll be a ghost out there... nothing can touch you, but you can't touch anything either.

choices.text: Keep up the good work, I guess...

guardQuips: Storm's brewing. I can smell it.
Stay within the perimeter. It's ugly out there.
Seen critters twice the size of these. You're lucky.
Don't let the quiet fool you. Desert's never really quiet.
Another day, another patrol. Beats the alternative.
Heard there's Scavs massing to the south. Watch yourself.
Captain Dax has us running double shifts. Something's coming.
Iron Parish pays well, but not well enough for what's out there.
You look like trouble. Good—we need trouble on our side.
The walls hold. For now.
Saw something moving near the ridge last night. Something big.
Keep your weapon ready. Always.
Verdleg traders came through yesterday. Nervous types.
Some nights you can hear the Trogs chanting. Eerie stuff.
Desert takes what it wants. We just delay the inevitable.
Another sunrise. Count your blessings.
Karth Directorate's been sniffing around. Bad sign.
I've seen that look before. Wanderer's eyes. Be careful out there.
Heat's getting to everyone. Stay hydrated.
Three years on this wall. Still breathing. That's the job.
